name: Bean boy (GlerG)
description:
A and D or the arrow keys to move, SPACE to jump.

Made for the 120th Trijam in 3 hours and 13 minutes using pygame, no assets were pre-made. I ended up going 13 minutes overtime because the game only had 2 levels once my 3 hours was up.

Credits:

Coding - myself

Art and Music - Taha https://twitter.com/tehabruh

Sound effects - Novaknight  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpkxK58N3_JE2hNKv6ibPbw
